query: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE attendance < capacity AND season = 2015
SELECT COUNT(stadium) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE month LIKE 'March' GROUP BY stadium HAVING COUNT(stadium) > 1
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE attendance > capacity AND season = 2015 GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT stadium FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE month LIKE 'February' AND year = 2016 AND attendance < capacity ORDER BY attendance DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE capacity > attendance AND month LIKE 'February' ORDER BY city
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE dayname = 'Monday' AND season = 2015 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
